changelogs.description: Joomla plugin. Code syntax highlighter that uses SyntaxHighlighter library (V3.0.90) of Alex Gorbatchev.
changelogs.maintainer: G@HService Berlin NeukÃ¶lln, Volkmar Volli Schlothauer

requirement.entry:
Tested with Joomla 3.9.18
Tested with PHP 7.2, 7.3, 7.4
Tested (only installation and updates) with Joomla 4.0.0-dev (nightly build 2020-05-15)
Tested with PHP 7.4

fix.item: Tabulator Custom CSS: Set default active value for CSS rule code background-color to NO because conflicts with CSS stylesheets other than default.
helper.php: Use File class instead of file_put_contents because of backend notice if folder _combiByPlugin deleted.
installerScript.php: Uninstall process fails under some circumstances with versions higher than defined maximumJoomla, maximumPhp.

note.item:
Uses syntaxhighlighter JavaScript library of Alex Gorbatchev. Version 3.0.90
https://github.com/syntaxhighlighter/syntaxhighlighter/releases/tag/v3.0.90
See also related and helpful editor button plugin plg_editors-xtd_syntaxhighlighterghsvs that helps to insert code snippets in editor/article text. Project page of editor button
